casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Wayne Thomas JOHNSON. No. 119P00-12. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 2, 2003. Wayne Thomas Johnson, Pro Se. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 1st day of August 2006 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Alamance County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of August 2003."
